Summary: Dominion Energy (D) analyzed 1 bill with 3 direct and 3 indirect impacts. Key impacts include two $0 subsidies and one 0% regulation. Overall risk assessment: low.
SummaryKeypoints: H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act imposes subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with short-term implementation The legislation states: "Termination and restrictions on clean electricity investment credit."

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act imposes subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with short-term implementation The legislation states: "Phase-out and restrictions on advanced manufacturing production credit."

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act imposes regulation. affecting operations in United States. with long-term implementation The legislation states: "This section shall not apply to any wind energy component produced and sold after December 31, 2027."

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act affects supplier General Electric (GE) (United States) through subsidy The legislation specifies: "Phase-out and restrictions on advanced manufacturing production credit."
H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act affects supplier Siemens Energy (Germany) through subsidy The legislation specifies: "Phase-out and restrictions on advanced manufacturing production credit."
